job_history.work_description: Directed and coordinated activities to build an online platform for Vietnam's SMEs and companies. Fostered communication internationally with team members on project targets, achievements, and improvements. Researched Vietnamese market to assess risk and opportunity to help develop and implement objectives.

Served as a primary contact for clients; and liaised with manager, trading desk, operations, custodians, and other related third-parties on a daily basis. Produced daily report for collateral portfolios totaling over $1.7B utilizing Bloomberg and other in-house systems; and reported them timely and consistently to top-tier clients and upper management.

Managed more than 100 corporate trust portfolios with a combined market value in excess of $15B and consisted of an eclectic variety of financial instruments. Effectively administered and reported daily large trust funds for Morgan Stanley, Exxon Mobil Corporation, and Harvard and consistently received high satisfaction from clients and upper management.

interests: Business English for Professionals and Entrepreneurs
Vietnam Entrepreneurs of Today and Tomorrow Network

skills.name: Project Management
skills.explanation: Successfully managed the development of an online platform for Vietnam's SMEs and companies, demonstrating strong proficiency in project management.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Directed and coordinated activities as a Founder and Project Manager, and served as a primary contact for clients, showing strong leadership skills.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Fostered communication internationally with team members and liaised with various stakeholders, indicating strong proficiency in communication.

skills.name: Risk Assessment
skills.explanation: Researched the Vietnamese market to assess risk and opportunity, showing a solid working proficiency in risk assessment.

skills.name: Financial Analysis
skills.explanation: Effectively administered and reported daily large trust funds for prominent clients, demonstrating strong proficiency in financial analysis.

skills.name: Portfolio Management
skills.explanation: Managed over 100 corporate trust portfolios with a combined market value in excess of $15B, showing strong proficiency in portfolio management.

skills.name: Client Relationship Management
skills.explanation: Served as a primary contact for clients and consistently received high satisfaction from clients and upper management, indicating strong proficiency in client relationship management.

skills.name: Bloomberg
skills.explanation: Utilized Bloomberg to produce daily reports for collateral portfolios, showing a solid working proficiency in the tool.
